ygData.subject: Re: Elkantar list of things to remember as a Wizard v1.0
ygData.msgSnippet: If I m in a tight pickle and I see the tanks dropping, I m reaching for the gate button...  This little 135 hp clothe covered powder puff gnome wizard
ygData.messageBody:
If I'm in a tight pickle and I see the tanks dropping, I'm reaching for the
gate button... This little 135 hp clothe covered powder puff gnome wizard
definately CAN'T take that heat where the warriors fell.

- Flik


At 11:03 PM 4/16/99 PDT, you wrote:
>From: "Elkantar The Merchant of Occlo" <the_elkantar@...>
>
>1. Whenever you are engaged in battle, wether you think you can win
> or not, always type /loc before or during battle. That way when
> or if you die you can scroll up in the chat window and get a
> general idea asto where your corpse is.
>
>2. Never run after losing your sticks(warriors). The beast will catch
> you anyways and all you will do is waste a couple hours looking
> for your corpse cause it is not with the others.
>
>3. Before you train up from leveling. Make sure you have researched
> what skills you will really need for the next level.
>
>
>Hope these help. Feel free to add to this list.
>
>Elkantar the Wizard (Tunare)
>
